title: Hester Waring's Marriage
description: When Miss Hester Waring's father died, she was left destitute and near starvation. Her rescue came from an unlikely source - Mr Tom Dilhorne, an ex-convict and now the richest man in Sydney. He needed a lady for a wife, and Hester was undoubtedly a lady, even if her father had taught her to mistrust Tom.
author: Paula Marshall
